definitions.definition: The state of being free from physical or psychological disease, illness, or malfunction; wellness.
definitions.example: Her mental health is really affected by stressful environments.

definitions.definition: A state of well-being or balance, often physical but sometimes also mental and social; the overall level of function of an organism from the cellular (micro) level to the social (macro) level.
definitions.example: The directors are concerned about the financial health of the project.

definitions.definition: The amount of damage an in-game object can withstand before it is destroyed.
definitions.example: The enemies on this level have a lot of health.
